about_the_game:
Unveil the secrets behind the Excavation of Hob's Barrow with this digital art book. Made with the same love and care as the game itself, this visual companion features concept art, processes for character development, storyboards and even scenes that didn't make it into the final game. The book also includes commentary and descriptions of the creative processes from the developers, from thought processes to tackling creative differences in a light-hearted yet engaging manner.

Explore the world of Hob's Barrow in full detail through pages filled with concept art, character studies, promotional material, pixel art designs, fan-art, storyboards, unused cut-scenes, and much more!

  • 51 pages
  • Concept & design art
  • Storyboards for cut-scenes
  • Unseen art
  • Fan art
  • Unique insight into the decision making behind the art of the game

To access this digital art book:

  • Right click The Excavation of Hob's Barrow in your Steam Library
  • Select Manage
  • Select Browse Local Files
  • Open Art Book.pdf
